title: Product Management in Shopify
description: Master the art of managing your product catalog, variants, and inventory in Shopify.

blocks.content: Effective product management is crucial for your online store's success. Learn how to organize and optimize your product catalog.

Essential product setup steps:

  • Product information and descriptions
  • Image optimization and management
  • Pricing strategies
  • SEO optimization for products
  • Product categorization

Handle product variations effectively:

  • Creating variant options
  • Setting variant prices
  • Managing variant inventory
  • Bulk variant editing
  • Variant image assignment
